QuestData.Title: Shivertail's Den
QuestData.Description: The Frostwolf pup looks at you with his big eyes. He howls and stares into the cave.$b$bIt's unusual for a wolf this young to be wandering around by itself. Shivertail's parents must be nearby.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search for Shivertail's parents in Frostfire Ridge.
QuestData.RewardText: Shivertail snuggles up to his mother. He is clearly happy to be reunited with most of his pack.
